channel.title: Lbaas on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Lbaas on SoftLayer API

item.title: LBaaS Examples
item.description: This example covers a variety of API calls that you might want to use when interacting with the Load Balancer as a Service offering. General information about this service can be found on the Load Balancer as a Service Documentation """ Cancel a Load Balancer as a Service This sample shows how to cancel a LBaaS throuth its UUID, ID or Name, just uncomment the methods you want to use. Author: SoftLayer Technologies, Inc.
